nodes.label: let quest_log = & mut ctx . accounts . player_quest_log ;

for objective in quest_log . objectives . iter_mut () { let goblin_monster_type_id = 3 ; let is_target_objective = (objective . objective_type == ObjectiveType :: Slay) && (objective . target_id == goblin_monster_type_id) ; objective . progress = objective . progress . saturating_add (is_target_objective as u32) ; }
let is_target_objective = (objective . objective_type == ObjectiveType :: Slay) && (objective . target_id == goblin_monster_type_id) ;
objective . progress = objective . progress . saturating_add (is_target_objective as u32) ;
msg ! ("Quest progress updated for slaying a monster.") ;
